Class RobotCentering

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.usfirst.frc.team1891.visionsystem.RobotCentering

  • public class RobotCentering
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used for robot centering based on the vision processing input.

    Tyler

    • Constructor Detail

      • RobotCentering

        public RobotCentering(double optimalCenterY,
                      double optimalCenterX)
        Constructor for RobotCentering. If you do not know what the values should be, place the robot in the exact position that you would like it to drive to. Then use the GRIP GUI to find the values that you want. If the values change between testing cycles make sure that the camera is in a fixed position as well as the target.
        Parameters:
        optimalHeight - set this value to the optimal height input to be centered on.
        optimalCenterX - set this value to the optimal center X input to be centered on.
